article.class: fl-post post-112 page type-page status-publish hentry

div.p: Please find all communications and updates regarding COVID-19, school closures, and ongoing resources at our BPS Communications Portal. Please contact the school directly with any questions. Thank you and we will get through this together.
Welcome to E Prep & Village Prep Willard Campus, a non-profit, public charter school campus serving elementary and middle school scholars from throughout Cleveland.

We partnered with SchoolDox to create a short film about our three E Prep & Village Prep campuses. Get a look into our schools by meeting faculty and leaders and seeing what it's like to be a part of our community. Look for scenes and staff from our Willard Campus!

div.h4: Claps, cheers, and chants energize our highly focused classrooms. Motivating school-wide routines create a culture where scholars thrive. Welcome to E Prep & Village Prep Willard Campus, a non-profit, public charter school campus serving elementary and middle school scholars from throughout Cleveland.

div.p: E Prep & Village Prep Willard Campus serves students in elementary and middle school, and welcomes students entering at any grade or ability level.
Our founding campus scholars' student growth in on par with top-rated suburban schools. Learn more about our entire academic program.
E Prep & Village Prep Willard is located in Cudell near I-90 and W 95th St. at 9401 Willard Ave., Cleveland, OH 44102. Come in for our next School Visit!
All our classrooms are named after colleges and universities, and our graduates consistently earn spots at top area high schools.

blockquote.a: E Prep & Village Prep Willard Campus

div.p: Our mission is to provide a high quality, academically rigorous education for the college bound scholar. We empower our scholars to think critically, assume social responsibility, and serve as advocates for themselves and the community. We achieve these goals with in a highly focused, structured and safe environment. We, as a community of educators, families and scholars work relentlessly to ensure that every child is prepared to succeed in a competitive world.

h2.a:
E Prep & Village Prep Willard
9401 Willard Ave., Cleveland, OH 44102

h1.span: Ready to Take The Next Step?

div.p: Our school is public and open to all families, but we do have limited spaces due to class size and grades served. If you are interested in enrolling your child, please sign up to visit our school or start their application early. Thanks for your interest!

Visiting our school is the best way to see if it is right for you and your child. Tour our school, meet staff and families, and get to know us. We have several tour dates available, and if you can't make them we'll set up a personal tour!

Ready to start your child's application? Great! Get started online today. We use SchoolMint to process all enrollments and paperwork. You can save your account as you go, and always contact us with any questions.

E Prep & Village Prep Willard Campus is a member of Breakthrough Schools, the #1 rated network of public charter schools in Cleveland, Ohio. Breakthrough Schools is a group of mission-driven schools committed to providing Cleveland-area families with distinct educational options. Learn more here.

p.strong: Explore all of our elementary and middle schools:

div.p:
- Citizens Academy
- Citizens Academy East
- Citizens Academy Southeast
- Citizens Leadership Academy
- Citizens Leadership Academy East
- Citizens Leadership Academy Southeast
- E Prep & Village Prep Cliffs
- E Prep & Village Prep Woodland Hills
- E Prep & Village Prep Willard

em.a: We are proudly sponsored by CMSD

p.span: For a copy of CMSD’s most-recent annual report, please click here.

div.div: Copyright, 2018 E Prep & Village Prep Willard, a Breakthrough School
Staff Mail // (216) 586-3892 // 9401 Willard Ave., Cleveland, OH 44102
